channel.title: [PI] Voltrex-scape [PI] Spawn server 24/7 Looking for staff
channel.description:
Voltrex-scape has come some ways in the week or so it has been out. There is a lot more to come. Thank you all for looking at my project I'm working on [B][COLOR="#B22222"]This is not complete only in [Alpha Stage][/COLOR][/B]
You guys can all access the game at the webclient which on the site - [URL=http://"http://voltrex-scape.webs.com/webclient"]http://voltrex-scape.webs.com/webclient[/URL]
I will have a domain name within the next week, Also will up load an applet so people can play without webclient tomorrow.
Some features of voltrex-scape...
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]SPAWN, Minimum usage of space for least lag![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Spawn.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/Spawn.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]STAFF LISTS[/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/staffList.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/staffList.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Fully working Wheel![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/wheel.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/wheel.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]All gfx and specials working for weapons![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/gfxSpecial.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/gfxSpecial.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]All working and custom skills![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/skills.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/skills.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Teleports for bosses, minigames and pking all 100% working![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/pking.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/pking.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/minigame.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/minigame.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/boss.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/boss.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/boss2.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/boss2.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Shops neatly and strategically placed![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Shops2.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/Shops2.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Shops1.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/Shops1.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Quest tab completely setup for almost every use including some spawn commands! Character Info![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/characterInfo.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/characterInfo.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/questabInfo.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/questabInfo.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Settings Completely adjustable![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/gameOptions.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/gameOptions.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Working curses 100%, Spec restore 100%, ancient,lunar, and prayer recharging 100% placed neatly![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Altar.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/Altar.jpg[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR="#B22222"]All working emotes! Including skill capes![/COLOR][/B] [URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/emote.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1085.photobucket.com/albums/j422/t8240826/emote.jpg[/img][/URL]
More coming soon...

item.title: [PI] Voltrex-scape [PI] Spawn server 24/7 Looking for staff
item.dc:creator: @climatikk climatikk
item.description:
@climatikk wrote:

Because I just put it up for beta so people can see how far I’m going to go. I chose pi because it’s so easy to manipulate, so if you don’t want to play then don’t but you will have fun and more will come… :palm:

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Voltrex-scape [PI] Spawn server 24/7 Looking for staff

item.title: [PI] Voltrex-scape [PI] Spawn server 24/7 Looking for staff
item.dc:creator: @climatikk climatikk
item.description:
@climatikk wrote:

Voltrex-scape has come some ways in the week or so it has been out. There is a lot more to come. Thank you all for looking at my project I’m working on [B][COLOR="#B22222"]This is not complete only in [Alpha Stage][/COLOR][/B]

You guys can all access the game at the webclient which on the site - [URL=http://“http://voltrex-scape.webs.com/webclient”]http://voltrex-scape.webs.com/webclient[/URL]

I will have a domain name within the next week, Also will up load an applet so people can play without webclient tomorrow.

Some features of voltrex-scape…

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]SPAWN, Minimum usage of space for least lag![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Spawn.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]STAFF LISTS[/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/staffList.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Fully working Wheel![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/wheel.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]All gfx and specials working for weapons![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/gfxSpecial.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]All working and custom skills![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/skills.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Teleports for bosses, minigames and pking all 100% working![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/pking.jpg.html][/URL]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/minigame.jpg.html][/URL]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/boss.jpg.html][/URL]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/boss2.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Shops neatly and strategically placed![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Shops2.jpg.html][/URL]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Shops1.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Quest tab completely setup for almost every use including some spawn commands! Character Info![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/characterInfo.jpg.html][/URL]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/questabInfo.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Settings Completely adjustable![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/gameOptions.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]Working curses 100%, Spec restore 100%, ancient,lunar, and prayer recharging 100% placed neatly![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/Altar.jpg.html][/URL]

[B][COLOR="#B22222"]All working emotes! Including skill capes![/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://s1085.photobucket.com/user/t8240826/media/emote.jpg.html][/URL]

More coming soon…
